headline: “一个无形的牢笼”：中国如何管控未来
description: 各地警方正在采购能够收集大量监控数据的技术，以预测犯罪和提前干预。相关系统和软件针对的是那些在算法和当局看来行为或特征可疑的人士，即便他们是无辜的。

author.name: Paul Mozur, Muyi Xiao and John Liu

headline_zh-Hans: "An invisible cage": How China can control the future
headline_zh-Hant: "An invisible cage": How China can control the future
description_zh-Hans: Police everywhere are procuring technology that can collect large amounts of surveillance data to predict crime and intervene early. The systems and software in question target people whose behavior or characteristics appear suspicious to algorithms and authorities, even if they are innocent.
